titleInfo.title: Ernest Tubb and his Texas Troubadours - You're On My Mind (C 25307) / That Wild And Wicked Look In Your Eye (live radio performance)

mods.abstract: Ernest Tubb and his Texas Troubadours studio recording of You're On My Mind (C 25307, World 800-8236); followed by a (likely live radio) performance of That Wild And Wicked Look In Your Eye.
